p: The animals were then sacrificed by euthanasia under anaesthetic overdose; dissection was done and the heart, liver, kidney, and spleen were isolated and immediately stored in 10% neutral-buffered formalin at −80°C for histopathological analysis. Various organ tissues were processed for histological preparation using paraffin embedding and were sectioned at 4 μm using a microtome and stained for histological evaluations using Eosin and Hematoxylin stains [ 18, 19].
